name: This Game Will Not Make You Rage
name_original: This Game Will Not Make You Rage
description:
A free downloadable platformer that I began to create in my spare time.

  • Rage-inducing
  • 3D
  • Latest Version of Unreal Engine 4

This game will be getting updates, but not frequently.

This Game Will Not Make You Rage is a free, rage-inducing platformer. Do epic parkour as a weird green cube with eyes - but be careful, there's super low friction and no air control.
